text: <@U02E3CRMA|joel> pinned a message to this channel.

<!here|@here> putting final touches in place to facilitate a move to Neon Room for Trent, Elise, Megan and Rob today.  Will ping when I’m done so y’all can begin ght emigration/set up process either this afternoon or Monday
Of note, looks like Allie is using the presenter notes for her feedback
<@U2670DYLE> and <@U0XJFPSRL> did y’all sync up today on CMS UX?

I tested ability to control the video from messaging thru showtime, works great. can pause play stop all that jazz, anything the youtube player api exposes <https://developers.google.com/youtube/js_api_reference> I setup a messaging route for throwing targeted commands at objects on the display. So if a video is on display1, panel0 slot 0, you could target that one and play the video. allowing the podium to act as a playback control
also this allows targeted updates of content on the screen, if we needed to dim it out, or some form of call to attention on a specific item as directed by the podium, this will allow that
elise provided me the updated wires that I am working from. once I've completed first cut, i plan to sit down with elise to do any tweaking. Should be on monday.
ok <@U2670DYLE>, can you add Rob and I to that meeting for visibility/velocity tracking?  trying to guage overall progress and stuff for schedule calibration
Also tested bodymovin in this system, works just fine. all plumbed into the display, easy to throw a body movin json into the google bucket, and then link to a slot on the screen for playback.
sure thing
this is awesome <@U0EL0GLEL> curious, where is there talk of using Bodymoving?  Attract mode or is it being eyed for other areas as well?

And I added the transitions system, I explained how this works to jason, trent and emily a little bit ago, but allows for in out, and while displayed animations to happen. So an object could fade in, animate somehow, and fade out when replaced. any of these are optional
yeah attract mode is where its being tested right now
i dont forsee any other areas, but that is up to design, either way its very very easy to add in any animations through this that we need

Im getting together the concept of basic messaging between podium and display. I think i have most of that defined. will need to solidify and write it up. Im trying to build out the areas that we know we need, and be agnostic of design and interaction. Being ready to support where we land on those via meta data to pull them together.
so far looking awesome for that.
i love all of this.

and the animation code for the transitions should be really straight forward and eaiser than cubby was. I changed up some stuff to help there. I have a setup and execute routine for each. If we can manage to get all animations to just execute on a container div, they could be wrote in a sandbox, I think we can do this, I supply a page, with a div, and some content that would be pretty much what we would have in real system. The page has a js file loaded to it, with these functions. Mo could take that and make the div in that page animate as needed updating those functions. From there its simple as I take those functions and put them into the animation service, copy and paste. should functions just the same. Keeping work stream very light and easy for Mo if she is going to help with these. I have it setup using velocity again, so we can get those nice callbacks that things have finished, so it can track animations progress etc…
we’re all set up for the move in Neon.  Ping me if you want help moving your styff Monday otherwise: <@U0B9N0HF0> <@U026E0ZNR> <@U0HP6TFNX> <@U0XJFPSRL> look for a pink post it with your name on it!
Right on. I'll miss my spot by the window in Siberia, but it'll be good to be with the crew. Thanks Dza
and if anyone doesnt super dig their spot, i’m open to negotiating.  whatever makes this team gel, i support (though i may regret this offer later!)

Perhaps <@U02F9CXTL> & I can review motion stuff, and then <@U0EL0GLEL> , <@U2670DYLE> & <@U243UT96G> we can all sit down and see what needs to be reviewed (ex: how pictures come on, how text appears, etc).
<@U243UT96G|mo> has joined the channel
Word let's keep in mind mo's not officially on the project team yet. Some initial riffing might be ok but she's actively sprinting on another project.
Good to know <@U0ML49XU0>
